summary: Investment management platform with deposit tracking for e-projects and multi-mode payment verification
architectural_notes: Admin-only access for appending e-project deposit options
Multi-mode payment tracking: GPay, Crypto, CBDC, Wallets
Dual transaction ID fields: NatValue (required) and stringValue (optional)
Payment verification flow: UPI (secoin@uboi) + WhatsApp notification + Ethereum ERC20 deposits

existing_features.title: Add a 'Default Deposits on e-Projects' dropdown field in the InvestmentForm component with the following 38 secoinfi-apps options: e-contract-lwf, e-contracts-bqe, etutorial-lgc, etutorials-cso, evolved-ai-o6e, forms-sxn, geo-map-w9s, golden-sec-vri, ia-niqaw-947, icp-cloud-storage-hvk, infi-loop-1au, infytask-mia, ipfs-lrm, key-unlock-5hx, map-56b, moap-app-6ag, multi-apps-unify-app-hbc, n8n-tasks-c2i, n8n-workflows-6sy, networth-htm, op-hotels-rests-ae0, pvt-projects-7wo, sec-build-0bj, sec-epay-am0, sec-jewelry-j03, secoin-ep6, sitemap-hub-fe2, sitemap-hub-sy0, sitemap-nya, sitemap-subs-app-j3h, sitemaps-fwh, sudeep-hotels-eu8, terror-uproot-97d, trends-63c, trends-d1l, voice-invoice-au1, xcaller-0aw, yo-data-app-o7u. Add a 'Mode' dropdown field to TransactionForm with options: GPay, Crypto, CBDC, Wallets. This field should be required for all fund transactions.
Add two transaction ID fields to TransactionForm: a required 'Txn ID' numeric input field (Nat type) and an optional 'Txn ID (Text)' text input field.

Display a prominent notice in TransactionForm that reads: 'After successful Deposit to Our UPI A/c: secoin@uboi, Pl. verify the Trn ID by submitting details here & Send a Copy by Chat to https://wa.me/919620058644. Include Crypto Deposits receipts as Txn ID after sending Ethereum on ERC20 Mainnet to Our Eth ID: 0x4a100E184ac1f17491Fbbcf549CeBfB676694eF7. Pl. Recheck & Verify if Details to be Submitted is Correct.'
Add a confirmation dialog or review step in TransactionForm that displays all entered transaction details before final submission, allowing users to verify the information is correct.
Update TransactionList and TransactionsList components to display the new transaction fields: mode, numeric transaction ID, and text transaction ID (when present).

new_feature_requests.summary: Add Default Deposits on e-Projects dropdown with secoinfi-apps list (admin-only)
Add transaction mode field (GPay/Crypto/CBDC/Wallets) and Txn ID fields (NatValue + optional stringValue)
Display deposit verification notice with UPI (secoin@uboi), WhatsApp contact, and Ethereum address (0x4a100E184ac1f17491Fbbcf549CeBfB676694eF7)
Add submission verification/confirmation step before final submit
Store the selected e-project value in the backend Investment type by adding an eProject field of type ?Text to the Investment record in main.mo.
Update the Transaction type in main.mo to include three new fields: mode of type Text, txnIdNat of type Nat, and txnIdText of type ?Text.

projectName: Extend Create Investment with e-Projects Deposits and Multi-Mode Transaction Verification
